name: Ararat Park Hyatt Moscow

reviews.text: As luxury city hotels go, this is right up there with the best. It's modern, sleek, beautifully designed with stunning, spacious rooms. My room was unbelievably big, with a fabulous shower and extremely comfortable bed. Breakfast was brilliant. Location is superb, just a short walk from Red Square and the Kremlin. Moscow is not always a friendly city, but this hotel was just amazing.
reviews.title: Sheer luxury

description: Ararat Park Hyatt Moscow is located in the very heart of the city, within immediate vicinity to the Bolshoi Theatre and only few minutes walk from the Kremlin, Red Square and Saint Basil’s Cathedral. The city hotel in Moscow is also close to the Parliament House, the central business district and luxury shopping malls TSUM and GUM. Ararat Park Hyatt Moscow is a timeless, residential style hotel designed for the discerning traveller who seeks privacy, personalized service and outstanding quality. The tastefully furnished luxury 211 rooms including 21 suites, feature individual designs that project a cosmopolitan yet very residential feel. Hotel's restaurants and bars of Moscow promise to become a source of inspiration and include Café Ararat, known for Armenian specialties, Conservatory Lounge & Bar, recognized as one of the Best Bars in the World by Architectural Digest for its panoramic views over the city and outstanding contemporary design, elegant Neglinka lounge, The Park Restaurant and Japanese restaurant Enoki. Stylish conference rooms and beautifully decorated banqueting facilities are venues of choice for any occasion, including business meetings and social events, as well as exquisite festivals and weddings in Moscow with attentive personalized service. In the pursuit of meeting the needs of the modern traveller, this luxury hotel of Moscow is glad to offer its guests the services of Quantum Spa & Health Club, featuring the latest cardiovascular technology to benefit the fitness enthusiast as well as those who are focused on pure pampering and relaxation.
